content:
Ninnodu paapam cheythudayone!
Kopippichu-malinathayaal nyangall
Neethiyaho vaalloorunnaakil
Nyangallkkaayu nin-krpa nilakollllatte
Kaalam theeraaraayengkil nyangadeyantyam
Ninnaardrathayathilaakaname.

Daasan kuttam cheythonudayon
Thalsnehithare-abhayam praapichaal
Abhyarththhanayum yaachanayum ko-
Ndavanudayon maa-ppekidumennaakil
Nin sleebaaye abhayam sampraapichoraam
Nyangallodalivundaakaname.

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkall mel krpacheyyenam.

Thaan parudeesin velliyil povaankaaranamente-
Naadaam thaathan makkalle nannaayu bodhippichu
Munnadhikaaram naanamkedaal vannoru veezhcha
Thottattheennulllluchaadanamenniva varnnichu.

Paanyumaratthe praapichoraappaazhpaadangall
Kkillavakaasham divyapadatthe sparshicheedaan
Edan thottakkaniyentiyoraa kaikallkkethum
Yogyathayillatthirubaliyin melarppicheedaan.

Sanchaaratthaal mashihaa mannin mullllukall neekki
Thallllappettonaadam veendum parudeesaarnnu.
